amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the Forest Service from implementing the recreational fee demonstration program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 1 and printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funding by the Forest Service to implement the recreational fee demonstration program authorized by section 315 of the Department of the Interior and Related Agencies appropriations Act, 1996 for units of the National Forest System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A023) Failed by voice vote.
